definition: to order the arrest of sb as criminal/to list as wanted
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc

sentences.english: Yellow to porch suffer Hong Kong police, who had to go to taking home for help.
sentences.chinese: 黃以軒遭受香港警方通緝，只好前去去晏家求助。

sentences.english: Chinese man gets death penalty for murdering 13.
sentences.chinese: 殺13人通緝犯成瑞龍佛山獲死刑。

sentences.english: Pour countries accepted the arrest warrant, told officers and soldiers themselves know the whereabouts of the person.
sentences.chinese: 傾國接下了通緝令，告訴官兵自己知道那人的下落。

sentences.english: Russia also accuses Britain of refusing to extradite Russian citizens wanted by Moscow.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯還指責英國拒絕莫斯科通緝的俄羅斯公民。

sentences.english: The suspected criminal is being hunted by police following a burglary in Swansea in September.
sentences.chinese: 這名疑犯因涉嫌九月份在斯旺西行竊被警方通緝。

sentences.english: that woman is wanted in 5 states for credit-card fraud.
sentences.chinese: 那位婦女因信用卡欺詐而被5個州通緝。

sentences.english: Ben, fly her picture. Let's get a bolo broadcast out on her.
sentences.chinese: 本，把她的照片發出去，發佈通緝令。

sentences.english: The police thought that Arab League bold is the chieftain, dealing in narcotics definitely is he instigates, then issues a warrant for arrest him.
sentences.chinese: 警方認爲阿豪是頭目，販毒肯定是他主使，便通緝他。

sentences.english: This week, Serbia arrested one of Europe's most wanted men.
sentences.chinese: 本週塞爾威壓逮捕了歐洲頭號通緝犯。

sentences.english: That woman is wanted in 5 states for credit-card fraud.
sentences.chinese: 那位婦女因信譽卡訛詐而被5個州通緝。

sentences.english: The Ministry of the Interior proceeded to demand the arrest of 55 prominent Houthi figures.
sentences.chinese: 也門政府內政部繼續通緝55名胡西領導人。

sentences.english: The wanted man dived into an alley to escape from the police.
sentences.chinese: 那個通緝犯潛進一條小巷躲避警察的追捕。

sentences.english: It was fixed to the plaster next to the postmaster's window, the place of honor usually reserved for the Wanted posters.
sentences.chinese: 通常這個“榮譽之所”是給通緝犯們預留的位置。

sentences.english: Mr. Awlaki was wanted by both the United States and Yemen for his reported involvement in terrorist attacks.
sentences.chinese: 由於涉嫌恐怖襲擊，奧拉基被美國和也門通緝。

sentences.english: And Jeff han came to Shanghai, he found himself has been wanted for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 而韓志傑一來到上海，就發現自己早就被通緝。

sentences.english: SanJuanKid 41 minutes ago "12 years later, China's most-wanted sent back."
sentences.chinese: 12年後，中國的頭號通緝犯被遣返。

definition: (of a bird, fish etc) to be caught in a net/(of a tennis ball) to hit the net/(of a criminal) to be captured
to pursue/to be after/to hunt down (the perpetrator of a crime, an escaped prisoner etc)
to bring to justice/to hand over to the law
to report (an offense to the authorities)/to inform against sb
